languages.text: "Простите. Я всех подвела", {n}— неясно, кому адресованы эти слова — Абеляру, товарищам или бастующим рабочим, которых ждет казнь. Подавшись вперед, женщина вцепляется во вскинутое оружие, направленное на толпу.{/n}

"Sorry. I've let everybody down." {n}It's not clear who her words refer to — Abelard, her comrades, or the striking workers who are now doomed to die. Vent reaches forward and grabs the barrel of the weapon aimed at the crowd.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Простите. Я всех подвела", {n}— неясно, кому адресованы эти слова — Абеляру, товарищам или бастующим рабочим, которых ждет казнь. Подавшись вперед, женщина вцепляется во вскинутое оружие, направленное на толпу.{/n}

traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "Sorry. I've let everybody down." {n}It's not clear who her words refer to — Abelard, her comrades, or the striking workers who are now doomed to die. Vent reaches forward and grabs the barrel of the weapon aimed at the crowd.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: “对不起，我让所有人都失望了。”{n}你不知道她是在对谁说这些话，是阿贝拉德，是她的战友，还是那些注定要命丧当场的罢工工人。温特伸出了手，抓住了瞄准人群的枪口。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sorry. I've let everybody down." {n}It's not clear who her words refer to — Abelard, her comrades, or the striking workers who are now doomed to die. Vent reaches forward and grabs the barrel of the weapon aimed at the crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “对不起，我让所有人都失望了。”{n}你不知道她是在对谁说这些话，是阿贝拉德，是她的战友，还是那些注定要命丧当场的罢工工人。温特伸出了手，抓住了瞄准人群的枪口。{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: «Lo siento. He decepcionado a todo el mundo». {n}No está claro a quién se refiere, si a Abelard, a sus camaradas o a los trabajadores en huelga que han quedado condenados a muerte. Vent extiende la mano y agarra el cañón del arma que apunta hacia la multitud.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sorry. I've let everybody down." {n}It's not clear who her words refer to — Abelard, her comrades, or the striking workers who are now doomed to die. Vent reaches forward and grabs the barrel of the weapon aimed at the crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento. He decepcionado a todo el mundo». {n}No está claro a quién se refiere, si a Abelard, a sus camaradas o a los trabajadores en huelga que han quedado condenados a muerte. Vent extiende la mano y agarra el cañón del arma que apunta hacia la multitud.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: 「申し訳ありません、皆を失望させてしまいました」{n}彼女の言葉が誰を指しているのかは定かではない。アベラルドか、はたまた彼女の仲間か、それともこれから死ぬ運命にあるストライキ中の労働者たちか。ヴェントは手を伸ばし、群衆に向けられている武器の銃身を掴んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sorry. I've let everybody down." {n}It's not clear who her words refer to — Abelard, her comrades, or the striking workers who are now doomed to die. Vent reaches forward and grabs the barrel of the weapon aimed at the crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ありません、皆を失望させてしまいました」{n}彼女の言葉が誰を指しているのかは定かではない。アベラルドか、はたまた彼女の仲間か、それともこれから死ぬ運命にあるストライキ中の労働者たちか。ヴェントは手を伸ばし、群衆に向けられている武器の銃身を掴んだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Es tut mir leid. Ich habe alle enttäuscht." {n}Es ist nicht klar, wen sie meint – Abelard, ihre Kameraden oder die streikenden Arbeiter, die nun zum Tode verdammt sind. Vent greift nach vorne und packt den Lauf der auf die Menge gerichtete Waffe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sorry. I've let everybody down." {n}It's not clear who her words refer to — Abelard, her comrades, or the striking workers who are now doomed to die. Vent reaches forward and grabs the barrel of the weapon aimed at the crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es tut mir leid. Ich habe alle enttäuscht." {n}Es ist nicht klar, wen sie meint – Abelard, ihre Kameraden oder die streikenden Arbeiter, die nun zum Tode verdammt sind. Vent greift nach vorne und packt den Lauf der auf die Menge gerichtete Waffe.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi. Je n'ai pas été à la hauteur. » {n}Difficile de dire si elle s'adresse à Abélard, à ses frères d'armes ou aux grévistes désormais condamnés à une mort certaine. Elle tend le bras et attrape l'arme braquée sur la foule par le canon.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sorry. I've let everybody down." {n}It's not clear who her words refer to — Abelard, her comrades, or the striking workers who are now doomed to die. Vent reaches forward and grabs the barrel of the weapon aimed at the crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi. Je n'ai pas été à la hauteur. » {n}Difficile de dire si elle s'adresse à Abélard, à ses frères d'armes ou aux grévistes désormais condamnés à une mort certaine. Elle tend le bras et attrape l'arme braquée sur la foule par le canon.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Üzgünüm. Herkesi yüzüstü bıraktım." {n}Sözleriyle Abelard'ı mı, yoldaşlarını mı yoksa ölüm fermanı verilmiş grevcileri mi kastettiği belirsiz. Vent, sözlerinin ardından öne doğru uzanıyor ve kalabalığa doğrultulmuş silahı namlusundan yakalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sorry. I've let everybody down." {n}It's not clear who her words refer to — Abelard, her comrades, or the striking workers who are now doomed to die. Vent reaches forward and grabs the barrel of the weapon aimed at the crowd.{/n}
